body:
this is a big problem,  whenever im loseing lane ,  the teammate trashtalking to me , and make me angry,  and report me ,.  look the link : my history,  im aways win,  but whenever im loseing.  the teammate abuse me ,  and report me ,  and use all chat to say:  hey guys , report this asian ,  what the fuck? riot?
